txt.en:
'Mae govannen, friend. I see my dear sister still chafes at her imagined bonds.'

Sadorwen chuckles lightly.

'Golodhril is merely a few centuries old. She has not yet experienced all that ones such as ourselves have. I promised her that we could visit the places she reads about before we set sail for the West. However, I did not agree to allow her to become drake food.

'With your experience and skills, you could easily help her with some of the tasks she has set for herself. I am sure you are busy; however, you will no doubt pass by the weeds and vines she seeks. If you are interested, why not offer to go in her place for now.'
Golodhril is sulking in Bazanmanar.\n\nSadorwen has suggested that you help Golodhril.
DNT - Nósni is in Bazanmanar, in northeastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Nósni what Klátha said.
DNT - The pile of furs is next to Klátha in northern Clovengap.\n\nYou should add your furs to the pile.
DNT - Add furs to the pile
DNT - Klátha is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nNósni has asked you to bring the furs to Klátha.

DNT - 'I know you meant no harm, friend, but please tell Nósni that I have no interest in speaking with him until he apologizes for what he did. A pile of furs, no matter how fine, will not change my mind.' \n\nKlátha huffs and refuses to say anymore.
Sadorwen is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nGolodhril has asked you to speak to her sister Sadorwen on her behalf.
'She continues to treat me like a child, I see. Very well, I suppose I will accept your service.'

'Oh, hello! You are that hero of the realm, [placeholder], correct? My, it must be wonderful to be free to wander Middle-earth in search of adventure and glory.

'I am Golodhril. My sister Sadorwen and I have come to see the fabled Forest Beneath the Mountain!'

She sighs and slumps.

'Sadly, we have seen barely anything save rocks and weeds. I am a prisoner of my tyrannical sister! Perhaps you could speak with her, and tell her that Clovengap is nowhere near as dangerous as she fears.'
A pair of Elven sisters are on a journey to tour Middle-earth before leaving for the West.
